statements: SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, duration FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, duration FROM game_sessions ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, start_time FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT session_id, duration FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(duration) AS avg_duration FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, session_id FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time, duration FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM players WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id;
SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time FROM players LEFT JOIN game_sessions ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT start_time, end_time, player_name FROM game_sessions JOIN players ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, session_id, duration FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id WHERE duration < '30 minutes';
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT player_name, start_time FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT player_name, session_id FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, start_time, duration FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, session_id FROM players INNER JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE duration > '1 day';

SELECT players.player_name, game_sessions.start_time FROM players LEFT JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id LEFT JOIN game_sessions ON sessions_players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id ORDER BY game_sessions.start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, player_id FROM sessions_players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT id, session_id, result FROM game_results WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';

SELECT session_id, player_name, result FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id JOIN game_results ON sessions_players.session_id = game_results.session_id WHERE result = 'Win' ORDER BY session_id DESC;

SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time, duration FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id JOIN game_sessions ON sessions_players.session_id = game_sessions.id WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY start_time ASC;

SELECT session_id, player_name, duration FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id JOIN game_sessions ON sessions_players.session_id = game_sessions.id WHERE duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY session_id ASC, player_name DESC;

SELECT player_name, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM players JOIN sessions_players ON players.player_id = sessions_players.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_sessions > 3 ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email FROM players;
SELECT game_id, game_name FROM games ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, duration FROM game_sessions WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT report_id, player_id, report_text FROM reports WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT game_name FROM games WHERE game_id IN (SELECT game_id FROM sessions_games WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT report_text FROM reports WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT session_id, AVG(duration) AS avg_duration FROM game_sessions GROUP BY session_id HAVING AVG(duration) > INTERVAL '30 minutes';
